briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Potential Effect of Benralizumab on the Humoral Immune Response to the Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in Adolescent and Young Adult Patients With Severe Asthma
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel Group, Placebo-controlled, Phase 3b Study to Evaluate the Potential Effect of Benralizumab on the Humoral Immune Response to the Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in Adolescent and Young Adult Patients With Severe Asthma.
summary: This is a randomized, double-blind, parallel group, placebo-controlled study designed to investigate the potential effect of a fixed dose of benralizumab administered subcutaneously (SC) on antibody responses following seasonal influenza virus vaccination

primaryOutcome.measure: Postdose Strain-specific Hemagglutination-inhibition (HAI) Antibody Geometric Mean Fold Rise From Week 8 to Week 12
